ExternalDatabaseInfo.CreateViewSql:
(SELECT                 G.overnight_registration_id, STRING_AGG(G.equipment_id, ',') AS sub_equipment_id, STRING_AGG(I.InstrumentName, ',') AS sub_instrument_name
        FROM                    dbo.T_OvernightGroup AS G LEFT OUTER JOIN
                                        dbo.T_InstrumentBasicInformation AS I ON G.equipment_id = I.EquipmentId
        WHERE                   (G.main_equipment_flag <> 1) OR
                                        (G.main_equipment_flag IS NULL)
        GROUP BY           G.overnight_registration_id)
    SELECT                 R.overnight_registration_id, M.main_equipment_id, M.main_instrument_name, S.sub_equipment_id, S.sub_instrument_name
       FROM                   dbo.T_OvernightRegistration AS R LEFT OUTER JOIN
                                      main_equipment AS M ON R.overnight_registration_id = M.overnight_registration_id LEFT OUTER JOIN
                                      sub_equipment AS S ON R.overnight_registration_id = S.overnight_registration_id
